org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

类 NamespaceQuotaSnapshotStore

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class NamespaceQuotaSnapshotStore
extends Object
implements QuotaSnapshotStore<String>
    QuotaSnapshotStore implementation for namespaces.

        public Iterable<Map.Entry<RegionInfo,Long>> filterBySubject(String namespace)
        从接口复制的说明: QuotaSnapshotStore
        Filters the provided regions, returning those which match the given subject.
        指定者:
        filterBySubject 在接口中 QuotaSnapshotStore<String>
        参数:

        指定者:
        setCurrentState 在接口中 QuotaSnapshotStore<String>
        参数:

        snapshot - The current state of the subject

      • setRegionUsage

        public void setRegionUsage(Map<RegionInfo,Long> regionUsage)
        从接口复制的说明: QuotaSnapshotStore
        Updates this with the latest snapshot of filesystem use by region.
        指定者:
        setRegionUsage 在接口中 QuotaSnapshotStore<String>
        参数:
        regionUsage - A map of RegionInfo objects to their filesystem usage in bytes
